title: A Clump of Trees

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on canvas.

publication_history:

exhibition_history: Chicago Historical Society, A City Comes of Age: Chicago in the 1890s, October 24, 1990-July 14, 1991.
provenance_text: Possibly sold in the sale of the artist, Paris, Pillet, January 22–February 1, 1866 [claimed by Art Institute of Chicago 1961 but not possible to verify]. Henry Field (died 1890), Chicago; his widow Mrs. Florence Lathrop Field; given to the Art Institute, 1894.
